mapper.select: SELECT d.deployNo , c.chainName , d.chainId , d.workType , d.requestDate , d.requestTime , d.serviceRequestId , d.worker , d.modifiedContents , d.requester , d.deployer , d.developConfirmer , d.testConfirmer , d.productionConfirmer , d.division , d.statusCode FROM deploy d JOIN CHAINTABLE c ON(d.chainId=c.chainID)
SELECT modifiedPrograms_pageId ,modifiedPrograms_pageName ,modifiedPrograms_deployNo FROM WPROGRAMTABLE WHERE modifiedPrograms_deployNo=#{deployNo}
SELECT modifiedResources_deployNo ,modifiedResources_wSourceName FROM WSOURCETABLE WHERE modifiedResources_deployNo=#{deployNo}

SELECT d.deployNo , d.chainId , d.workType , d.requestDate , d.requestTime , d.serviceRequestId , d.worker , d.modifiedContents , d.requester , d.deployer , d.developConfirmer , d.testConfirmer , d.productionConfirmer , d.division , d.statusCode , c.chainName FROM deploy d JOIN CHAINTABLE c ON (d.chainId=c.chainID) WHERE d.deployNo=#{deployNo}
SELECT employeeNo , employeeName FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE employeeName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{employeeName},'%')
SELECT chainId ,chainName FROM CHAINTABLE WHERE chainName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{chainName},'%')
SELECT pageId , pageName , chainId FROM PROGRAMTABLE WHERE pageName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pageName},'%') AND chainId=#{selectedchainId}
SELECT pageId ,pageName ,chainId FROM PROGRAMTABLE WHERE chainId=#{selectedchainId}

SELECT d.deployNo , c.chainName , d.chainId , d.workType , d.requestDate , d.requestTime , d.serviceRequestId , d.worker , d.modifiedContents , d.requester , d.deployer , d.developConfirmer , d.testConfirmer , d.productionConfirmer , d.division , d.statusCode FROM deploy d JOIN CHAINTABLE c JOIN MASTERTABLE m ON(d.chainId=c.chainId) AND (d.statusCode=m.codeValue) WHERE 1=1 AND d.chainId LIKE CONCAT(#{categoryChain}, '%') AND d.workType LIKE CONCAT(#{categoryWorktype}, '%') AND d.division LIKE CONCAT(#{categoryDivision}, '%') AND m.codeValue LIKE CONCAT(#{categoryStatus}, '%') AND m.codeType="CTGY_STATUS" ORDER BY CASE WHEN #{categoryRequestDate} = '오름차순' THEN d.requestDate END ASC, CASE WHEN #{categoryRequestDate} = '내림차순' THEN d.requestDate END DESC, CASE WHEN #{categoryRequestDate} = '요청날짜' THEN d.requestDate END ASC;
SELECT codeType , codeValue , codeName FROM MASTERTABLE WHERE codeType = "STATUS"
SELECT codeType , codeValue , codeName FROM MASTERTABLE WHERE CODETYPE=#{codeType}
SELECT DISTINCT(codeType) FROM MASTERTABLE WHERE codeType LIKE "CTGY%"
